original: Jonsson, Elov Sigfrid, läroverksadjunkt, Borås, f. 4/1/87 i Sthlm av disp. Erland J. o. Lovisa Jonsson. G. 16 m. Märta Björkqvist. Barn: Anna-Lisa f. 26. — Stud:ex. i Örebro 06, fil. mag. 11, provår v. norra real i Sthlm 13-14. E. lär. i Sundsvall 09, vik. adj. i Örebro 11-12, e. lär. i Borås 12-13, Örebro 14-15, adj. i Ystad 15-19, adj. i matem., fysik o. kemi v. Borås h. a. 1. sed. 19. Led. av Borås stadsrev. 22-32, bibi. v. lärov. sed. 20. RVO.
translated: Jonsson, Elov Sigfrid, high school teacher, Borås, b. 4/1/87 in Stockholm to Erland J. and Lovisa Jonsson, both of whom were employed as clerks. Married on 16th of a month to Märta Björkqvist. Children: Anna-Lisa b. 26. Studied at Örebro Secondary School until 1906, earned a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1911, and worked as a substitute teacher at Norra Real in Stockholm in 1913-1914. Became a permanent teacher in Sundsvall in 1909, substitute teacher in Örebro in 1911-1912, and permanent teacher in Borås in 1912-1913 and later in Örebro from 1914-1915. He served as a teacher of mathematics, physics, and chemistry in Ystad from 1915 to 1919 and as a high school teacher of the same subjects in Borås from 1919 onward. He was a member of the Borås city council from 1922-1932 and was also a librarian of the high school starting in 1920. He was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).
